@stinto; First voice. I haven't "broke" a thing, in fact, two days ago 480p was announced here, from long time user, as "playable" again, on  Mac, under QuickTime. Since 480p and 720p use ABSOLUTELY SAME setting (only 720p have understandably a higher bitrate) - I cannot see nor find any reasonable explanation for playback problems you have recently.

Since nobody else have said something like you just did, I only tip on local problems. You should use Reference Playback System from link I placed for good reason as part of long Header, and if you run Windows of any kind, there shouldn't be any problem in installing the items or find counterparts for different operating system, if needed.
